message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $8,000.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $9,500 for your product. Let me know if this works for you!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still holding out for a slightly higher price. I'm willing to come down to $9,750. It's a fair price considering its value to you and my own cost. Let me know if this works for you!

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I am still looking to keep the price within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $9,500. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us. Let me know what you think!
